Description: This corpus contains texts from 1849 to 2014.#SEPThe corpus is available through the CQPWeb concordancer.

Corpus: Corpus of old Polish texts until 1500 (Korpus tekstów staropolskich do roku 1500)
Description: This corpus contains texts until 1500.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.

Corpus: Corpus of the 16. century Polish (Korpus polszczyzny XVI wieku)
Description: This corpus contains texts from the 16th century.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Corpus: eFontes Mediae et Infimae Latinitatis Polonorum (Elektroniczny korpus polskiej łaciny średniowiecznej)
Description: This corpus contains texts from the 11th to the middle of the 16th century.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Corpus: The Electronic Corpus of the 17th and 18th century Polish (Korpus tekstów polskich z XVII i XVIII w.)
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1601 to 1772.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Corpus: XV century New Testament translations (Piętnastowieczne przekłady Nowego Testamentu – elektroniczna konkordancja staropolska)
Description: This corpus contains Biblical texts from 1380 to 1500.#SEPThis corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
